languages.text: "Я помню этот день, Лорд-капитан. Когда мы прибыли в капеллу, кровь и останки были везде. Но из всего, что мы там увидели, это было наименее пугающим".
"I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."
languages.original_text: "Я помню этот день, Лорд-капитан. Когда мы прибыли в капеллу, кровь и останки были везде. Но из всего, что мы там увидели, это было наименее пугающим".

traits.locale_text: "I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."
"I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."
"I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."
"I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."
"I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."
"I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."

languages.text: «Recuerdo ese día, Lord Capitán. Cuando llegamos a la capilla, había sangre y restos humanos por todas partes... y aquello fue lo menos aterrador que encontramos allí».
languages.original_text: "I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerdo ese día, Lord Capitán. Cuando llegamos a la capilla, había sangre y restos humanos por todas partes... y aquello fue lo menos aterrador que encontramos allí».

languages.text: 「あの日のことは覚えています、ロード・キャプテン。私たちが礼拝堂に到着したとき、そこら中に血と人の残骸が散らばっていました。しかし、そんなのは些細なもので、もっと恐ろしいものがあったのです」
languages.original_text: "I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."

traits.locale_text: 「あの日のことは覚えています、ロード・キャプテン。私たちが礼拝堂に到着したとき、そこら中に血と人の残骸が散らばっていました。しかし、そんなのは些細なもので、もっと恐ろしいものがあったのです」

languages.text: “我还记得当时的情形，舰长大人。当我们抵达礼拜堂的时候，到处都是鲜血和尸体，但和其他的恐怖情形相比，简直是小巫见大巫。”
languages.original_text: "I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."

traits.locale_text: “我还记得当时的情形，舰长大人。当我们抵达礼拜堂的时候，到处都是鲜血和尸体，但和其他的恐怖情形相比，简直是小巫见大巫。”

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich noch an den Tag, Lord Captain. Als wir in die Kapelle kamen, war alles voller Blut und menschlicher Überreste. Das war jedoch noch mit Abstand das Harmloseste, was wir dort gesehen haben."
languages.original_text: "I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich noch an den Tag, Lord Captain. Als wir in die Kapelle kamen, war alles voller Blut und menschlicher Überreste. Das war jedoch noch mit Abstand das Harmloseste, was wir dort gesehen haben."

languages.text: « Je m'en souviens encore comme si c'était hier, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quand nous sommes arrivés dans la chapelle, il y avait du sang et des restes humains partout. Mais c'est la moindre des horreurs dont nous avons été témoins ce jour-là. »
languages.original_text: "I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en souviens encore comme si c'était hier, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quand nous sommes arrivés dans la chapelle, il y avait du sang et des restes humains partout. Mais c'est la moindre des horreurs dont nous avons été témoins ce jour-là. »

languages.text: "O günü hatırlıyorum Lord Kaptan. Şapele vardığımızda her yerde kan ve insan kalıntıları vardı. Ancak bunlar, orada gördüğümüz en korkunç şeylerin yanından bile geçmez."
languages.original_text: "I remember that day, Lord Captain. When we arrived at the chapel, there was blood and human remains everywhere. But that was the least of the terrifying things we saw there."
